articles.title: Redmi Note 10T 5G India Launch Set for July 20: Expected Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Redmi Note 10T 5G India launch date is set for July 20, Xiaomi announced on Monday. The smartphone debuted in Russia as a rebranded Redmi Note 10 5G that was launched in Europe and the Poco M3 Pro 5G that debuted in India.

articles.description: SpaceX has forced Europe’s space industry to come up with out-of-this-world ideas to compete in the satellite launching sector.
articles.content:
